name: Puzzle Stampede
summary:
Puzzle Stampede is a game of matching rows and columns. 

The game offers several single player modes as well as an online vs mode where players compete to reach the high score.

Game available in the Google Play Store

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.mygdx.stampedegame

How to Play:

- Swap icons to complete a row or column. Complete multiple rows/columns for bonus points.
- Level Mode: Clear every icon.
- Unlimited Mode: Compete for the high score by matching rows and columns. Every 5 scores increases the game speed.
- Vs Mode: Reach a set score before your opponents. Complete a row/column of bulls to unleash a stampede on your opponents, shuffling their board.
